review: I am a very happy mother because anytime I panic, the doctor has always been there for my child and provide immediate treatment for any symptoms. She always patiently listens to all the complaints and then gives us the steps needed to feel better. It is very rare to see someone who can listen patiently these days. My child feels better immediately when he knows I have made an appointment with Dr. Shila Narain and the doctor's smile always brings him a sense of comfort. I would absolutely recommend to anyone to consult without a doubt. Thank you doctor for all the help that you have given us in these difficult times.

I appreciate your anxiety. Sorry about illness of your son .Pray for his early recovery .
I had prescribed medicines for your son on 3 rd oct. ,  afternoon. Next morning i got information regards persistant fever and cough . You were advised to get a Xray chest done but there was no further information. I did not hear anything from you since then .
All febrile illnesses do not recover within 12 to 24 hours.
Thanks for  your feedback .
